title: Direct server transfers? :)

replies.body:
Hmm, it is very strange if this is a consistent issue you encounter. If it's just this time, it's because server transfers are still down for end of season, but you post makes it sound like this is a persistent problem for you?

I know there has been quite a few transfer issues on OCE this past year, so it's possible you have just been unlucky.

At any rate, once transfers are back up, if a direct transfer is still not available, I'd recommend shooting a ticket through to support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If for whatever reason direct transfers aren't available in the client, but the transfers themselves are possible, they can usually manually transfer you (they will still deduct the RP of course).

Thanks Seras Dragon, but the problem is jsut that the transfer from LAN server to OCE server is just not an option, I've transfered my account before and what I have to do is transfer my LAN account to EU server or NA and then, transfer it to OCE. The direct transfer is just not an option which is very sad because I have to spend twice as much RP to trasnfer my account from LAN to OCE.
I tried sending them a ticket but they said they can not manually transfer my account sicne it would be unfair to other players, they just suggested me to psot it here on the boards and hopefully get them to make the trasnfer an option. {{champion:32}}
Very odd, but it's out of my scope of knowledge. I'll try and chase up some info for you.
